segments.text: Mr . Smith , I have been doing some industry research and was shocked to learn that the average salary for a position that is similar to mine pays on average $ 2,000 more per year than I am c
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What are you basing this information on ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: First and secondary research . I hope that you can address this concern immediately as i find it very disturbing .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I will.We are very happy with your performance and want to continue our woodworking relationship .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I wish the same . As such , I hope you will seriously consider a pay increase .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Let me take this up with the Director and get back to you immediately .
segments.speaker: S2
